data.enText: relies
relying
relied
relied
rely on/upon sb/sth
to need or depend on sb/sth

data.chText: 在婴儿时期，我们完全依赖别人喂食。
data.enText: As babies, we rely entirely on others for food.

data.chText: 现在，我们在很大程度上依赖电脑来安排我们的工作。
data.enText: These days we rely heavily on computers to organize our work.

data.chText: 这一产业靠的是原料便宜，不涨价。
data.enText: The industry relies on the price of raw materials remaining low.
to trust or have faith in sb/sth

data.chText: 你应该相信你自己的判断。
data.enText: You should rely on your own judgement.

data.chText: 你可以相信我一定会为你保守秘密。
data.enText: You can rely on me to keep your secret.
He can't be relied on to tell the truth.

ex.chText: 大多数职业女性都依靠父母来帮助照顾孩子。
ex.enText: Most working women rely on parents to help look after their children.

ex.chText: 很多学生现在靠因特网获取信息。
ex.enText: Many students now rely on the Internet for information.

synonyms.bx: 指认为可以依靠某人或某物做某事，常后接介词 on/upon。

ex.chText: 那个国家严重依赖石油进口。
ex.enText: That country depends heavily on oil imports.

ex.chText: 那所学校中的很多小学生完全依赖公众捐助就学。
ex.enText: Many pupils in that school depend entirely on donations from the public.

ex.chText: 她指望丈夫告诉她所有的情况。
ex.enText: She was depending on her husband to tell her everything.

ex.chText: 别相信他——他从不信守诺言。
ex.enText: Don't depend on him - he never keeps his promises.

synonyms.bx: 指必须借助某人或某物的支持、帮助，也指对某人或某物有信心，常后接介词 on/upon。

ex.chText: 她是一位好老师，她的学生完全信任她。
ex.enText: She was a good teacher and her students trusted her completely.

ex.chText: 你不能指望飞机会准点起飞。
ex.enText: You can't trust the plane to take off on time.

synonyms.bx: 指认为某人诚实或不会做坏事，也指确信某事物不会出问题。

data.enText: rely on/upon sb/sth
to need or depend on sb/sth

data.chText: 在婴儿时期，我们完全依赖别人喂食。
data.enText: As babies, we rely entirely on others for food.

data.chText: 现在，我们在很大程度上依赖电脑来安排我们的工作。
data.enText: These days we rely heavily on computers to organize our work.

data.chText: 这一产业靠的是原料便宜，不涨价。
data.enText: The industry relies on the price of raw materials remaining low.
to trust or have faith in sb/sth

data.chText: 你应该相信你自己的判断。
data.enText: You should rely on your own judgement.

data.chText: 你可以相信我一定会为你保守秘密。
data.enText: You can rely on me to keep your secret.
He can't be relied on to tell the truth.

example: I swear by my grandmother's recipes

value.def: If you rely on someone or something, you need them and depend on them in order to live or work properly.

example.ex: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers...
example.tran: 他们非常依赖职业咨询师提供的建议。

example.ex: The Association relies on member subscriptions for most of its income.
example.tran: 这个协会的收入大部分来自会员的入会费。

value.def: If you can rely on someone to work well or to behave as you want them to, you can trust them to do this.

example.ex: I know I can rely on you to sort it out...
example.tran: 我相信你会把它解决好的。

example.ex: The Red Cross are relying on us.
